messages.message:
Hi Team,
Scrolling the fields towards right in `"Results table"` mode on hovering the field names line is not working but the same is working in Human review screen.

I'm flagging this issue because when a table field with many columns is present as one of the fields, it becomes time-consuming to scroll to the right, especially when we need to hover over the documents row and scroll.

cc : @Nithin

This is happening b/c the results table is actually 2 separate scroll containers: 1 for the column headings & 1 for the body.
When you horizontally scroll on the body it’ll trigger a scroll event on the headings to adjust their position. The reason the headings can’t trigger a scroll is b/c they have overflow hidden which is necessary to avoid a double-scrollbar.

The proper fix here is to use a single table w/ full-width rows for the class names so there’s a single scroll container.

@Serena Migrating to `TableGrid` will take some time but would ultimately fix a lot of the awkwardness we’re seeing in this table & hopefully improve perf since it’s horizontally virtualized. Any opposition to this approach or does this ticket require an immediate quick fix?

nope, this issue has existed for a long time and doesn’t warrant a quick fix, i’ll close the current ticket

hopefully @danny.lan will have more time for the `TableGrid` migration next sprint?
I could try to get it done ASAP before we get more involved in Case Management
i see, @danny.lan how far along did you/Arjun get on the `TableGrid` migration? would it be worth transferring to Liam since you’re working on other tickets for the time being?
